Name: John Muriango
Title: Sad
Review: Sad.So much darkness in an already darkened world.How I pray that Light of the world upon the devotees so that they may see and be set free.

Name: Tanvi
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Temple is very beautiful . It is a temple where u can find peace and positive vibes . I visited here with my kids . We felt relaxed and happy after coming here .

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Ramakrishna math is good and beautiful temple. Campus was big and beautiful. There was spacious parking area.

Name: Reyan11
Title: Monastic institution
Review: Contains idols of ramakrishna , swami Vivekananda Math houses a goshala. Math also has a guest house

Name: 592abck
Title: Best place in city
Review: Best place in city/ I really loved this place due to its serene beauty and calm atmosphere. Very clean.

Title: A must see place in Lucknow
Review: If you are in Lucknow then you must visit the Ramakrishna Math ,a branch of Ramkrishna Math& Mission of Belur. There are so many spiritual and religious activities going on through out the year,A very peaceful and silent place  .Dont miss the evening prayers in the meditation hall, you will get a great calmness and   a  good feelings. They are very discipline and punctual in time. Also visit the Library and book stall and appreciate the surrounding gardens.I think what even i say is very little, The monks are very dedicated and doing a great work, They have a 400 beds super- specialty hospital  near to Math.

Name: Usha65
Title: Very peaceful and serene place
Review: It is on the main road but very peaceful inside. Beautiful building and serene place. a Branch Center of the Ramakrishna Math & Mission, Belur. It is doing excellent service to the people also by running hospitals. The Matt is engaged in spiritual and religious activities.

Name: P N M
Title: Excellent
Review: On main Road Nirala Nagar Ram krishana Math is situated.The place is very attractive, Divotee. There are so many pilgrims who stay there for divotion of God

Name: Vibhu S
Title: Nirala Nagar
Review: This is place of peaceful holy place which was developed and name of swami vivekanand in Lucknow .Hospital and education also provided at the name of swami ji

Name: sidnet
Title: Serenity and the Vivekananda Consciousness
Review: When you get a Ramakrishna Matha and Mission right opposite your hotel, you get blessings as bonus. The Lucknow math is serene and spaciously constructed. Didn't get time to attend the evening aarati, but felt the same vibes of positivity and divine bliss right after walking in!

Name: Dryogendranath M
Title: Visit to Ramakrishna Math
Review: This Math is worth seeing by the visitors of all the religion and nationality. It is situated in the heart of the city.

Name: Alok N
Title: PEACE & TRANQUILITY
Review: It is situated little out of place but once you reach the Math, the feeling of peace in the environment is prevalent. Nothing about Lucknawi culture and if one does not have time then nothing is missed.

Name: sujatapant
Title: tranquil place
Review: From the chaos of outside,enter the peaceful environ of this spiritual,religous,charitable,educational ,medical institute.Amidst its expansive campus is the temple,a meditative space,a school run for the poor students,a kitchen where food is cooked and poor families are fed .a yog center open to all,bhajan and religous activity also.a library which has a good collection of books . a hospital is also run by the math as part of its charitable activities .

Name: ASTHA G
Title: Nice Place
Review: This is a bit si crowded place in the city. Accessible from all corners and is a silent place. Photography is not allowed inside and you have to remain silent.

Name: jaya u
Title: Sat Chit Ananda.
Review: If one has an attitude of a serious search for God, this place is a must visit. The quietude and peace at the Math is something one cannot express in words, one has to experience it to realise that. This place became my daily escape and my sanctuary. One whos consciousness is directed inwards, for whom things of the material world are of less significance will only be able to fully understand and experience this place. Leave your conceptual burdens behind before entering the math and experience ultimate bliss.

Name: Nivesh A
Title: Serene!!!
Review: It is a simple building..Nothing much inside ..Just a big hall for meditation and landscape outside. In totality it is a so so place

Name: ASTHA G
Title: A peaceful Place !!
Review: Located in the residential area this is a peaceful place to visit. It is never crowded but is a beautiful and spacious place. you are not allowed to make noice here. Just go and enjoy the beauty !!

Name: journey2016
Title: OLDEST MATH IN LUCKNOW
Review: ramakrishna math which is in niralanagar near IT crossing lucknow. ramakrishna math is in under of math's trust they keep and maintain all of its assets.. one thing i have to also mention here that vivekanad policlinic medical sciences is also under in math's trust.earlier i had gone here that time there was a huge crowd and ramkrishna paramhan's memorable antiques were kept for public.this is fabulous building.

Name: Uday Kumar H
Title: Ramakrishna Math & Mission- Lucknow
Review: After visiting Vivekananda Ashram, Shyamla Tal and Advaita Ashram, Mayawati for six days, we went to Ramakrishna Math & Mission- Lucknow. Duly taking into account the local circumstances and demands of public need, the activities of the Sevashrama have been mostly directed towards medical and health sectors, for giving relief to the ailing and the sick. This mission has been implemented does through Vivekananda Polyclinic which is a multi-facility hospital. The polyclinic fulfils the public needs by way of Rural Health Programmes carried on in the adjoining villages. More and more facilities are getting added to the polyclinic.The multifarious activities of the Math includes library, daily worship and bhajans, fortnightly Ramnam and Shyamnam, Sankirtans, and weekly religious discourses and lectures, Celebration of the birthdays of Sri Ramakrishna, Holy Mother Sri Sarada Devi, Swami Vivekananda and other religious prophets, in addition to Durga Puja and other festivals. The Math various cultural programmes, and personality development and yoga classes for students. Furthermore, the Math organises free coaching centre for 100 slum children, daily distribution of milk and tiffin to 100 poor children. The Math is instrumental in the expansion of cultural, religious and spiritual activities according to the universal principles propounded by Sri Ramakrishna, Holy Mother Sarada Devi and Swami Vivekananda and exemplified by their divine lives. Photography is prohibited inside the Math. But before knowing that, we took two photos. All contact information is available in the website. But I am furnishing them for the convenience of Tripadvisor fellow members.Address: Ramakrishna Math, Nirala Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh  226020Phone: 0522-2787191 & 0522-2787143Telefax: 0522-2787168Email: lucknow@rkmm.org, rkml@ramakrishnalucknow.orgWebsites: www.ramakrishnalucknow.org, www.rkml.org

Name: Haardik20
Title: Welcome to Shantisthan !!
Review: Perfect architecture. Mind relaxing attraction. One can go in the morning  and can enjoy in the amidst of nature fresh air. Gardens are well maintained. Very peaceful place. Although photography is not allowed it is a nice place. It is around 1 to 1 1/2 hour stay. Is worthy of one time visit

Name: satish k
Title: Peaceful and relaxing place.. Wonderful
Review: When I entered into the RamKrishna Math, it's different world with peace and relaxed place,. Place is awesome..i like it

Name: priyask1215
Title: “Peaceful, shanti place”
Review: amazing well maintained place. dont forget to meditate in the temple. best time to visit in evening time.

Name: manoj k
Title: Glimpses of Ramakrishna and Vivekananda
Review: if you want know and read about Ramakrishna and Vivekananda  this is good place to be there. very rich collection of Books .

Name: lucknowkitchenin
Title: aisi shanti aur kahan
Review: very peaceful place, if you are too tired or in tension can visit and spend some time, i can guarantee one will come out happy and gay

Name: sriharshab768
Title: Peaceful, shanti place
Review: Go there with lot of time to relax. amazing well maintained place. dont forget to meditate in the temple.

Name: Kushal N
Title: Spirituality Center
Review: Small but peaceful place, quite tranquil especially those who seek spiritual solace.  The place is strict to keep the religious sanctity and maintains rituals seriously with proper timings. Unlike many religious places they are not too keen on donations and offerings, so I find it less intimidating

Name: Ajay_Kaushik
Title: A place for mediation and peace
Review: This is a very god place for mediation and peace. Ideal time to visit is during evening hours which rituals are being performed. Places is nicely maintained. if you want some peace and looking to connect to inner self this place provide ideal environment. it is very nicely maintained

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: holy place
Review: One of very good place for worship and visit as well. Alike other Rama Krishna Math, it conducts daily evening prayer "Khandana Bhavo...", where one can meditate peacefully for some time on daily basis

Name: SSKNP
Title: Divine Place
Review: Sri Ramkrishna Math is divine place in Lucknow in the memory of great sage Sri Ramkrishna Paramhansa.You can visit this place for meditation,calm and spent your time with yourself.

Name: satyaprakash375
Title: Excellent
Review: we are visited in every Sunday when im in Lucknow, Ramakrishna math staff is maintain his cleaning very well. best time to visit in evening time.

Name: guddu1954
Title: a serene place
Review: We have been visiting the place very frequently since last many years whenever we are in Lucknow.The best time to visit is during Durga Puja celebrations.
